item.title: RareSkills Gas Puzzles
item.description: Gas Puzzles by Rareskills are a sequence of smart contracts to practice gas optimization. These are used as practice assignments for RareSkills.io and the Udemy Gas Optimization Course Array Sum Let’s start with the easiest one contract OptimizedArraySum { uint256[] array; function setArray(uint256[] memory _array) external { require(_array.length <= 10, "too long"); array = _array; } function getArraySum() external view returns (uint256) { uint256 sum; for (uint256 i = 0; i < array.

item.title: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹
item.description: Welcome to my blog, where I share my experiences and insights as a junior solidity developer in the exciting world of blockchain technology. I’ll be writing about the latest developments in blockchain security and sharing my solutions to challenging Capture the Flag (CTF) exercises. Follow along as I continue to learn and grow as a developer, and join the conversation by leaving comments and asking questions. Thanks for stopping by!
